facts.title: The book I'm reading recently
facts.content: Reading 'Wanting' by Luke Burgis - it's making me think about whether my desires are actually my own or just copied from others. The mimetic desire concept is quite thought-provoking.

facts.title: My first DSLR camera
facts.content: Nikon D810 - I liked the image quality from that 36MP sensor. The lack of an anti-aliasing filter made the photos noticeably sharper, which suited my preference for detail.

facts.title: My recent camera purchase
facts.content: Fujifilm X-T4 - I switched because I got tired of carrying heavy gear. The film simulations are convenient for getting that film look without the hassle of actual film.

facts.title: My first computer
facts.content: HP desktop with Pentium 4 - I spent a lot of time exploring Windows, breaking things, and figuring out how to fix them. That's probably where I learned to enjoy troubleshooting.

facts.title: My first video game
facts.content: Super Mario Bros. on Nintendo - I can still remember the theme song. Those simple 8-bit graphics somehow created more lasting memories than today's complex games.

facts.title: My longest hiking adventure
facts.content: Coloane Island trail in Macau - I went expecting just a walk, but ended up spending more time there than planned. The coastline views were worth the extra time.

facts.title: My recent AI agent product
facts.content: Claude Code by Anthropic - I'm drawn to its CLI interface. As a geek, there's something irresistible about having an AI assistant that lives directly in the terminal where I spend most of my time.

facts.title: My favorite investment guru
facts.content: Howard Marks from Oaktree Capital - I appreciate his investment memos because they focus on risk management rather than just chasing returns. His approach to market cycles makes more sense to me than most gurus.

facts.title: My favorite podcast
facts.content: 知行小酒馆 by 有知有行 - I like how they discuss investment but focus more on life philosophy. The idea that investment success comes from becoming a better person resonates with me.

facts.title: My favorite football team
facts.content: Juventus FC - I started supporting them after playing FIFA 06, where they seemed like the strongest team in the game. Been following 'la Vecchia Signora' ever since.
